alert.note: Alert for Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 3:07AM EST until January 04 at 2:30AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Scioto River at Circleville. Scioto River at Piketon. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Scioto River at Circleville. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Lowland flooding continues along the river, with flooding along Island Road worsening. Canal Road near State Route 104 also has flooding, as well as Cooks Creek Golf Course and State Route 762 in northern Pickaway County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM EST Monday the stage was missing due to a gauge outage. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 16.6 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
